item.description:
This is the opening reception.

Description of the show from the website:

Cambridge Artists' Cooperatives Art to Wear exhibit has been a delight since 1990. Our 18th annual show will feature clothing by acclaimed American textile artists, fashion designers, dazzling handcrafted jewelry and gorgeous one-of-a-kind accessories. This years exhibit, showcases artists from New England and around the country with a passion for exotic textures, sublime colors and innovative techniques.

2008 Participants: Kristine Baker, Kathy Barinholtz, Malin Bengtsson, Robin Bergman, Jennifer Cauffman, Marisa Dipaola, Jenne Giles, Bobby Gorban, Paul Guttry, Amy Heit, Barbara Herbster, Ji Yeon Hwang, Chun Pil Kim, Ann McMahon, Amy Nguyen, Cheri Reckers, Cara Romano, Michele Shubert, Carter Smith, Barbara Willis, & Suza Wooldridge

I'll be there from 5:30 to about 6:30. The reception goes until 7:30, but I have another commitment immediately after.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a purple flower pin.
item.name: Cambridge Artists Cooperative 18th Annual Art-to-Wear Show
